thath nikayika sarwa kruthyayan manawa srujuwa ha samruddhimathwa itukarana lada bawin 2002 di adhikarana sanghanayaka dhurayen da, dakshina lankawe pradhana sanghanayaka padawiyenda, 2008 di nawathath nikayehi anunayaka dhurayen da 2011 di thath nikayehima maha nayaka dhurayen da samothpannawuye sangha sobhana gunathi, aadarsha sampanna, sarwa nayinma ema thanathuruwalata hathpasinma yogyawana bawini. 1969 di yathokka wiharasthanadwayehi adhipathithwayata pathwa wiharastha dayakarakadin ha hudi pradeshiya janasamuhaya wenuwen karana lada uthkrushta, anupameya mehewara aahladakaraya.
